extendedInfo.description: Smart, Simple, Secure and Mobile!(You can use this app to review your current account balances and payment history, even if your plan does not require you to file claims).File claims, attach and upload receipts and view account information for your BESTflexSM Plan and EBC HRASM. My Mobile Account Assistant lets you access the best features of our My Account Assistant web portal, including viewing account balances, filing claims, and attaching receipts and viewing recent payments.We make filing claims easyMy Mobile Account Assistant lets you file a claim and upload a receipt, at the pharmacy, your provider or anywhere you have access to a 3G or wireless internet connection. Filing a claim for any eligible health care or dependent care expense doesnât get any easier than this. Complete a few lines on a simple form, upload your receipt using your phoneâs camera and tap âSubmit.â My Mobile Account Assistant makes filing claims smart, simple, secure and mobile! Faster than faxingClaims processing is faster when you file your claim using My Mobile Account Assistant. Youâll never want to fax us another claim again.Smart, Simple, Secure and Mobile!My Mobile Account Assistant is smart because it helps you enter claim information correctly, itâs as simple to use as your phone and secure because we donât save any of your account information in the application.Thereâs more to Mobile than just filing claimsYou can review your current Account Balances at any time, whether you elect the BESTflex Plan Health Care or Dependent Care FSAs, Limited Health Care FSA or have an Individual Billed Premium Account. If you participate in the EBC HRA, you can view your current EBC HRA balances for any of your coverage types.Your claims Payment History is available for viewing, too!Features in detail * Automatically displays your plans* View Account Balance and Payment History* Lists of providers saved for each plan* Enter and save new providersAdditional features are based on your plan design and can include:* Filing a claim, including uploading receipts or choose receipts from your phoneâs photo library* Email receipt confirmation of filed claim* Email notification when claim is processed with link to Claims History* Prevention of inaccurate claim filing dates   - For service claims dated outside of plan year  - For future dated claims against Health Care Flexible Spending Accounts (FSAs) or the EBC HRA  - For the Health Care FSA or the EBC HRA service claims dated after termination dateTags: ebcflex, ebc, flex plan, hra, employee benefits corporation, mobile account assistant, fsa

reviews.title: Easy!
reviews.comment: Shows which transactions need documentation and allows you to attach an image of the receipt.
reviews.author: Sean Schipper

reviews.title: Disappointed
reviews.comment: I am now able to enter the date but each time I attach a receipt the app restarts itself & tells me my credentials have expired. I had hoped they would have all the issues fixed. Scratch that. Installed on a new phone & once again I can not enter a date. I loved this app back when it actually worked.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: No longer compatible - Very Disappointed
reviews.comment: I installed this app a while back and used it and was pleasently supprised at how easy it was. The next time I tried I could not get a picture to attach without the app restarting and saying that my credentials have expired (then I have to log back in and start the claim process again). Each time I tried to attach an image (whether taking a new picture or using an existing image) the same thing happened. I thought that I would just uninstall and reinstall the app but low and behold this app is no longer compatible for my device, well it once was and I liked it but apparently an update changed that.     Incompatible with my Samsung YP-G70 (Galaxy Player 5.0).
reviews.author: Joshua Huckins

reviews.title: Alright App
reviews.comment: This is a very basic app, it does give you just about all you would need. A few features could be added to make it a  little better such as why the claim was denied and such.
reviews.author: Adam Bushcott

reviews.title: Fast!
reviews.comment: Love the app. Makes submitting claims easy and fast.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: So easy!
reviews.comment: I dont know what everyone is complaining about...this app works perfect. I would give it 10 stars!!!
reviews.author: Ryan Nelson

reviews.title: New user
reviews.comment: I just submitted my first claim and app crashed.  Second attempt worked.  I just received my confirmation email.  Very easy to use.
reviews.author: Rich PinotGrigio

reviews.title: Uselesss
reviews.comment: Tried three times to submit a claim. Every time I attached a picture, the app went back to home screen and says my credentials timed out. A worthless app.
reviews.author: Dan Seidensticker

reviews.title: Errors
reviews.comment: I loved the app the first few times, way faster much better process. Today I keep getting \342\200\235enter a valid date\342\200\235. There is no help feature
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Doesn\'t work
reviews.comment: Can\'t enter dates. Needs to have two separate spaces for date maybe. Please fix! I have Sg3
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Convenient!
reviews.comment: Easy to use. Fast upload. Only thing is can\'t tell how many images can be uploaded and no option to delete image if wrong image is uploaded.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Error!!!!
reviews.comment: Firsr couple of times I used app it workwd great- now I get same error issues others are posting frm over two weeks ago! Fix it already!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Worked at first
reviews.comment: Echoing below, worked a few times then \'enter valid date\' and becomes useless.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Not useful
reviews.comment: It does not allow me to upload claim. Keeps saying \"enter valid date\"
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great for balance and claims submissions!
reviews.comment: I found the app simple to use.
reviews.author: A Google User
